There was no record of disposition available for 1 sheep that had left the facility. Failure to document dispositions
prevents APHIS officials from verifying the destinations of animals. Per this Section, exhibitors shall make and maintain
complete records regarding the details of the acquisition and disposition of animals in their possession in order to account
for the sources and destinations of the animals. The facility must prepare a record of disposition for the sheep, and this
must be reflected in the record of animals on hand. The facility must also ensure that animal records are kept current for
all future animal acquisitions and dispositions.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
